entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:25 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 3:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -2.0°C

Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 63 %

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 in the evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
